title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
Introducing the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat - a compact, yet powerful solution to keep you warm and cozy in any indoor space. This ETL certified ceramic portable heater is perfect for your Home, Dorm, Office, or Kitchen, with three modes: 750W heating for smaller spaces, 1500W heating for larger areas, or air circulation mode for a gentle breeze.

Measuring only 7.72 inches by 6.38 inches by 9.13 inches and weighing just 2.6 pounds, the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater is easily portable and can be placed anywhere you need it. Its sleek design and black finish will blend seamlessly into your décor.

Safety is our top priority, which is why this heater is equipped with overheat protection and tip-over protection that automatically turns off at a 45-degree angle for added peace of mind. In just 2 seconds, this PTC ceramic heater delivers quick and efficient heating to warm up your space in no time, all while keeping noise levels below 45 dB for quiet operation.

With intuitive controls, thermostat functionality, and a compact design, the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat is an essential addition to any indoor environment. Heat up to 200 square feet of space and enjoy the comforting warmth this powerful heater provides. Order yours today!

**Advertising Description:**

Introducing the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat - a powerful, yet compact solution to keep you warm and cozy in any indoor space! With its sleek Black design, this 1500W/750W ceramic heater is perfect for your Home, Dorm, Office, or Kitchen.

Boasting three modes including 750W heating, 1500W heating, and air circulation (fan mode), you can easily customize the warmth to fit your comfort level. Experience quick heat delivery within just 2 seconds!

Your safety is our top priority with overheat protection and tip-over protection that automatically shuts off at a 45-degree angle for added peace of mind. This ETL certified heater is compact in size (7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13 inches) and lightweight (2.6 pounds), making it easily portable for various settings.

The KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat features a PTC ceramic heating element that generates heat rapidly while maintaining low thermal resistance, ensuring quiet operation below 45 dB. Enjoy the added convenience of an intuitive control panel and thermostat to maintain your preferred temperature effortlessly.

Heating an area of up to 200 square feet, this versatile heater is ideal for small to medium-sized rooms. So whether you're working late at the office or studying in a chilly dorm room, trust the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat to keep you warm and comfortable all year round!

Your safety is our priority. This space heater features overheat protection and tip-over protection, which automatically shuts off at a 45-degree angle for added peace of mind. Enjoy the warmth with confidence, knowing that your KISSAIR Compact Space Heater is working safely and efficiently.

Quiet and unobtrusive, this heater operates below 45 dB, ensuring you can focus on your work or relax in peace without being disturbed by excess noise.
